description.ko: 유기적인 꽃잎이 반투명한 광섬유 인맥과 융합되어, 디지털 숲 속에서 리듬감 있는 네온 에너지를 뿜어내는 미래 지향적 식물 표본입니다.
description.en: A futuristic botanical specimen where organic petals merge with translucent fiber-optic veins, pulsating with rhythmic neon energy in a digital forest.

prompt: A close-up cinematic shot of FLORA-9, a hybrid digital flower with translucent petals containing glowing circuit patterns, iridescent textures, deep forest background with floating data particles, 8k resolution, photorealistic, neon cyan and violet lighting, macro photography.
